channel.title: Al Huzaifa Furniture UAE
channel.description: Luxury Home Furniture Designs in UAE

item.g:title: Mt80510-1-180b table lamp
item.g:description: Designed to suit your sense of style, the MT80510-1-180B Table Lamp with its vintage Mason-style shade and dimpled smoky glass base adds texture and intrigue to the room. The decorative Edison bulb casts a beautiful warm glow for the piece de resistance.

item.g:title: Mt21531-1 table lamp
item.g:description: A decidedly contemporary take on the conventional table lamp. MT21531-1 is a study in sleek simplicity with a slim gilded stem and overextended finial that gives this table lamp the illusion of a floating ivory linen drum shade.

item.g:title: Mt20520-2-250t table lamp
item.g:description: The MT20520-2-250T Table Lamp resonates vintage-inspired charm with a contemporary silhouette. Cloaked in soft, clean lines and a beautifully antique brushed brass, MT20520-2-250T casts warm light and a vision of glamour in both contemporary and classic decorated homes.

item.g:title: Mt10973-1-250 table lamp
item.g:description: Add vintage flair to your corner table or console with the retroesque MT10973-1-250 Table Lamp. Petitely proportioned with a sultry smoked globe atop a matte wood and brushed brass base, this tabletop piece exudes elegance with an industrial edge.

item.g:title: Md21561-3-460 pendant lamp
item.g:description: An asymmetric cluster of crystal clear orbs shimmer in playful, whimsical splendor. Blown glass drips from a slender gilded stem in this focal pendant lamp of modern influence. Extraordinarily chic and compellingly eclectic, the MD21561-3-460 Pendant Lamp perfectly complements a range of decor styles.

item.g:title: Md10919-13-2400t pendant lamp
item.g:description: Brass branches and faceted glass lampshades shape the MD10919-13-2400T Pendant Lamp’s effortlessly organic silhouette. Infuse your space with warm layers and dreamy detail that adds a note of whimsy and casts magical shadows when illuminated.

item.g:title: Mb60192-7-1075 wall lamp
item.g:description: A spectacular over-sized galaxy of brass discs craft an atmospheric piece of art by day, and wonderfully dramatic wall lamp by night. Undeniably chic with contemporary edge describes the MB60192-7-1075 Lamp, that enhances and enlightens your modernist-inspired space.

item.g:title: Mb60192-1-250 wall lamp
item.g:description: Re-imagine your space with the flick of the switch. Evocative of vintage glam lighting, the MB60192-1-250 Wall Lamp’s exquisite beaten brass sphere emanates the warm golden glow of a single concealed bulb. Add instant elegance to any space with this vision of understated artistry.

item.g:title: Mb10919-2-480t wall lamp
item.g:description: Of angular allure, punctuate your space with this unique sconce that crafts a stunning contemporary ambiance. Spliced brass and faceted frosty glass shades emit warm diffused light, gracing a feature wall with a striking and eclectic accent.

item.g:title: Jersey tv unit
item.g:description: Accented by cool, creamy veneer and brushed bronze detail, the Jersey TV Unit boasts a unique contrast of intricate nuances and bold minimalism. Elegantly proportioned with a barely-there silhouette, this piece is fabulously extravagant in its sculptural simplicity.

item.g:title: Cataleya tv stand
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 5TH OCTOBER Luxurious lines, a softly curved silhouette and gorgeous scallop accents, the Cataleya TV Stand truly captures the essence of luxury living. Its sweeping diorama of grain topped with an expansive veined marble top is unequivocally suave, enhancing the definition and distinction of any home.

item.g:title: Renee chair
item.g:description: This whimsical piece has the air of retro chic to it. Textile upholstery in hues that ranges from mustard, aqua and blush to shades of chrome, Renee is rather individualistic and exudes a groovy vintage vibe.

item.g:title: Cruz bar table
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 10TH NOVEMBER The Cruz Bar Table rises to every occasion. Anchored by an elegant trumpet base, slender and staggered columns of brushed brass support a beautifully bevelled round top of white marble. Elegant and industrial, pair this piece with matching bar chairs, or mix and match for an eclectic flair.

item.g:title: Irina buffet
item.g:description: The bold and the beautiful Irina Buffet epitomizes sleek, architectural lines of modern design. Warm oak accented with the perfect proportion of buffed copper craft an elegant and tailored profile where fashion and furniture converge.

item.g:title: Andes side board
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 30TH NOVEMBER A beautiful melange of warm chiselled walnut and champagne metal detail crafted for the luxurious, contemporary home. The Andes Side Board’s sweeping panorama of geometric patterned wood with gorgeous grain cleverly conceals generous shelving within.

item.g:title: Monterosa sofa set
item.g:description: Reinventing design elements for the present and drawing inspiration from the past, we bring you the Monterosa Sofa. The beautifully streamlined set fits snug in velvety soft upholstery with diamond quilted backs, held to high standard on champagne gold bases.

item.g:title: Carmela bar chair
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 10TH NOVEMBER

item.g:title: Arthur desk
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 31ST OCTOBER

item.g:title: Prada sofa
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 29TH OCTOBER A quintessential Chesterfield upholstered in leather with deep button tufting and rolled arms. Postured atop a svelte brushed gold exposed frame, the 4-piece Prada collection pushes the boundaries in its traditional design with an elegant, contemporary twist.

item.g:title: Cataleya sideboard - marble
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 30TH NOVEMBER

item.g:title: Valentino side board
item.g:description: Understated luxury that overwhelms. With an affinity for symmetry, light and dark, grained walnut and brushed copper - Valentino balances rich textures and tailored details infusing your home with a certain je ne sais quoi.

item.g:title: Jersey buffet
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 10TH NOVEMBER The exemplar of style in simplicity, Jersey’s seamless front doors flow uninterrupted by hardware to cleverly conceal generous fixed shelving storage. The subtlest geometric nuances and bronze-finished base add charming definition to this piece.

item.g:title: Michela sideboard
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 27TH DECEMBER A showcase of sublime craftsmanship, Michela is a singular work of functional art. Its soothing silhouette is marked by fluid contours that flow seamlessly over the length of this impeccable piece, cleverly concealing spacious storage within.

item.g:title: Michela console
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 30TH NOVEMBER It’s taken thousands of years to create this wild play of white and color streaks in black marble. Refined, yet raw. Polished, yet primal. The hand-contoured walnut base mirrors a wave of energy frozen in time. Michela.

item.g:title: Savina side board
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 10TH NOVEMBER With strong lines and a magnificent personality, Savina’s wow factor is undeniable. Carved woodgrain and smooth steel capture the essence of space and uber charismatic style.

item.g:title: Keegan dining table marble
item.g:description: The dance of diagonal planes. The rhythm of harmonised grain. Built on the geometric innovation that today's computer-aided design brings to life, Keegan adds that special edge. Topped with Romantic Marble

item.g:title: Keegan sideboard
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 10TH NOVEMBER The Keegan sideboard is a sublime amalgam of luxe design and unimpeachable functionality. The diamond faceted walnut surface, topped with dark marble elevates your dining space with oodles of sophistication.

item.g:title: Mahi cabinet
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 10TH NOVEMBER In a symphony of intricate texture and bold minimalism, the Mahi sideboard shows off an exquisite oval silhouette of woven creamy leather, dark walnut veneer and copper nuances. This is a legacy piece that takes exceptional craftsmanship and design to a whole new realm.

item.g:title: Floral pu painting (120x120)
item.g:description: A beautiful botanical capriccio imprinted on faux leather and framed in Matt gold lends a fantastical element to a stylishly curated room.

item.g:title: Floral pu painting (120x180)
item.g:description: A beautiful botanical capriccio imprinted on faux leather and framed in Matt gold lends a fantastical element to a stylishly curated room.

item.g:title: Grayer pu painting (120x180)
item.g:description: Nuanced monochromatic strokes make a striking, one of a kind abstract wall accent in a textured and rhythmic exploration of positive and negative space. Enriched with a minimalist axis of gold foil, Grayer is enduringly avant-garde.

item.g:title: Lafarfalla 2 painting (120x180)-glossy surface
item.g:description: The art of reflection in a neutral-hued palette with glimpses of gold make for an ever so tasteful collectible design, versatile enough to be displayed horizontally or vertically.

item.g:title: Labirinto 1 painting (80x120)
item.g:description: An abstract giclée reproduction showcases washes of dove grey, ebony and luminous gold, practically dripping off the imitation leather canvas.

item.g:title: Labirinto 2 painting (120x180)
item.g:description: An abstract giclée reproduction showcases washes of dove grey, ebony and luminous gold, practically dripping off the imitation leather canvas.

item.g:title: Piuma 1 painting (120x120)
item.g:description: Rich detail and texture are mesmerizing in their abstraction. Magnified plumes encased in a minimalist gold frame reflect an edgy sophistication to the design aesthetic.

item.g:title: Piuma 2 painting (120x180)
item.g:description: Rich detail and texture are mesmerizing in their abstraction. Magnified plumes encased in a minimalist gold frame reflect an edgy sophistication to the design aesthetic.

item.g:title: Piuma 3 painting -glossy surface
item.g:description: Rich detail and texture are mesmerizing in their abstraction. Magnified plumes encased in a minimalist gold frame reflect an edgy sophistication to the design aesthetic.

item.g:title: Macchine di vernice painting (120x180)-glossy surface
item.g:description: An abstract giclée reproduction showcases washes of dove grey, ebony and luminous gold, practically dripping off the imitation leather canvas.

item.g:title: Rocciosa painting -glossy surface
item.g:description: An impasto melange of rich indigo and the gleam of gold, these abstract prints in two sizes introduce visual interest to the whole room with their depth and layered vibrancy.

item.g:title: Goccioline painting (120x120)-pu
item.g:description: Quite literal in its expression, Goccioline flows rivers of gold over earthy washes. Strata of matte and incandescent tones transfix the room in a richly embellished composition.

item.g:title: Linee 1 painting (120x120)-glossy surface
item.g:description: A stunning geometric abstract composition of symmetry, balance and evocative optical illusion. There’s a certain element of poetry to Linee’s layers of strokes and angles of intrigue.

item.g:title: Piazza del cavallo painting (80x120)-pu
item.g:description: Bold and vibrant strokes define this seminal work of modern art. Piazza Del Cavallo brings an effusive yet calming energy to the room with soft colour palette and layered detail.

item.g:title: Peacock 3 painting (120x180)-glossy surface
item.g:description: High-concept wall art for the contemporary home. A juxtaposed plume of feathers of spirited detail in warm hues of candlelight, honey, and buttercream makes for an accent with trendy flair.

item.g:title: Montagna painting (120x180)-pu
item.g:description: Inspired by the great outdoors, create a unique and vivid design presence with this highland graphical illustration. On a leather-finish canvas with gold frame detail, this piece crafts organic and textural appeal.

item.g:title: Cat on stand table dÉcor
item.g:description: Nimble feline silhouettes in rich gold on a perch of natural marble available in three sizes evoke a graceful bohemian vibe.

item.g:title: Tray gold and brass
item.g:description: Fashioned from steel and finished in mottled bronze, this antiquey set is an elegant accent to any coffee table, console or vanity.

item.g:title: Marble tray black
item.g:description: A warm antique gold serving platter encircles a marble monolith to make for a decidedly contemporary tabletop vignette.

item.g:title: Table top dÉcor monkeys
item.g:description: The iconic Japanese Three Wise Monkeys, expressively crafted from cast iron and painted a warm gold epitomize inspirational design.

item.g:title: Finger sculpture table dÉcor grey
item.g:description: A hyper realistic sculpture intricately detailed in silvery grey metal and marble, this wonderfully modern work of art provokes contemplation and intrigue.

item.g:title: Finger sculpture table dÉcor
item.g:description: A hyper realistic sculpture intricately detailed in deep mocha coated metal and marble, this wonderfully modern work of art provokes contemplation and intrigue.

item.g:title: Horse leg table dÉcor
item.g:description: Edgy equestrian elegance. Fashioned from black marble and raw iron with a fossilized finished, this pair boasts a certain organic charm.

item.g:title: Candle holder marble & gold
item.g:description: Beautifully minimalist in design, candle holders of snow white marble pair with gilded steel in a modern mix of materials that glint and glow by candlelight.

item.g:title: Vase with gold top
item.g:description: The beautiful collection of clear glass accents tinged with an amber blush rim. Stunning as a single piece or cluster to your table setting.

item.g:title: Velar sofa set
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 31ST OCTOBER A protagonist to complement any living space, the floor-hugging Velar is beyond just aesthetic appeal. Enveloped in velvety-soft upholstery on antique gold finished legs, this luxuriously comfortable sofa set also reclines into blissful indulgence.

item.g:title: Tifany swivel chair + ottoman
item.g:description:
Defined by its elegant lines and classic silhouette, the timeless Tifany Swivel Chair and Ottoman brings retro glam to any room. Draped in suede-like fabric with a tall wrap-around back and plush seat, it draws you into a comforting embrace.
(Please note that Chair Blue is coming with Ottoman Blue Color)

item.g:title: Marrone sofa set
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 10TH DECEMBER A vision of decadence, Maronne is a seamless amalgam of distinguished characteristics. Velvety soft fawn textile and chocolate brown leather, deep diamond and biscuit tufting to vertical pleats – this sophisticated set is both effortless and exaggerated all at the same time.

item.g:title: Prada sofa
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 30TH NOVEMBER A quintessential Chesterfield upholstered in leather with deep button tufting and rolled arms. Postured atop a svelte brushed gold exposed frame, the 4-piece Prada collection pushes the boundaries in its traditional design with an elegant, contemporary twist.

item.g:title: Jersey dining table ceramic
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 10TH NOVEMBER Jersey, Art is conventionally placed in frames. Rarely, frames become art. Featured here is a piece of curved frames and planes in brushed brass, intersecting to support an expanse of smoky walnut with white ceramic top . Now ready to be acquired.

item.g:title: Palermo sofa set
item.g:description: Boasting a classic-inspired Chesterfield flair that blends beautifully with both contemporary and conventional décor. This versatile collection exudes simple elegance with a soft, neutral colour palette, rich walnut legs and a streamlined silhouette.

item.g:title: Sashka corner sofa set + ottoman
item.g:description: Of clean lines and minimalist design, the Sashka Corner Sofa and Ottoman works in harmony with a myriad of décor styles. It’s earth tone, deep seats and armless form, are what define its lounge-worthy luxury.

item.g:title: Glam side table
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 10TH NOVEMBER There’s an art to making your space truly individual - we would start with the Glam Side Table. In sleek and staggered dimension, low-slung drum contours of brushed brass float atop setback dark wood in sensationally decorative platforms that would look divine in your luxurious lounge.

item.g:title: Amalfi coffee table set
item.g:description: Sculptural beauty brought to life in rich grained walnut, Amalfi splendidly embodies a mix of contemporary and classic aesthetics. Its exquisitely flared sections perfectly pieced together on brushed brass legs and exposed rivet detail makes for a decadent design statement.

item.g:title: Mitch end table
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 30TH OCTOBER Modern and understated, Mitch End Tables are a functional work of art. The white marble top and rich copper tripod silhouette allows the simple genius of its design to shine through. Transform your living space with its elegant geometry.

item.g:title: Remi round side table
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 30TH OCTOBER Form and function converge in the Remi Round Side Table. Crafted of wood, marble and steel with a warm brushed bronze finish, this clever ‘C’ table is perfectly posed over a sofa, chair or chaise.

item.g:title: Aldis end table
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 30TH NOVEMBER A timeless piece of uncomplicated yet impressive design, Aldis’ clean architectural legs float a beautifully veined marble top. Its simple elegance makes a profound statement.

item.g:title: Aldis coffee table
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 30TH NOVEMBER A timeless piece of uncomplicated yet impressive design, Aldis’ clean architectural legs float a beautifully veined marble top. Its simple elegance makes a profound statement.

item.g:title: Arnold end table
item.g:description: Style and convenience – what more could you want? Create a functional centerpiece in your living room while adding stunning design and beauty with this coffee table that comes with Yellow Hole Natural Marble top.

item.g:title: Kaira side table
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 31ST OCTOBER Impeccable stylish, Kaira features a tawny glass top and glossy lacquered base encased in a rounded frame crafted from brass plated steel in a pipe style. It’s architectural attitude is defined by a bold silhouette and sculptural shapes.

item.g:title: Caleb end table
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 10TH NOVEMBER The Caleb Side Table sits unassumingly at the center of your living room, quietly adding to the décor. Its top is made of natural grey marble, while the base is brass plated.

item.g:title: Savina end table
item.g:description: EXPECTED DELIVERY BY 10TH NOVEMBER First, the base. Like the swirl of a Flamenco dancer’s skirt, is this intriguing lineup of hand contoured wood strips, built piece by painstaking piece on to a brass platform. The top is a slice of subtly grained marble. All in all Savina is a performance art.

item.g:title: Mosaic dining chair
item.g:description: This is a minimalist approach to dining chairs. The Mosaic collection adds to the beauty of your interiors and makes heads turn.

item.g:title: Eastwood dining chair
item.g:description: The Eastwood dining chairs are designed keeping contemporary aesthetics in mind.This chair is sure to get you interested.

item.g:title: Table dÉcor family - black
item.g:description: Fashioned from resin in a matte black finish. An evocative piece that captures the essence and expression of family with minimal yet intricate detail.

item.g:title: Table dÉcor hand left and right - dark bronze +white
item.g:description: This statuesque pair of sculptures makes quite the statement piece. An intriguing play on the duality of black and white, metal and stone, left and right.

item.g:title: Table lamp 3085 - gold+black
item.g:description: A unique natural-chic approach to design evocative of natural tree bark in all its textured glory. The simplicity of the marble base and pristine white shade only accentuate its sculpted finesse.

item.g:title: Table lamp 3083 - gold+black
item.g:description: A unique natural-chic approach to design evocative of natural tree bark in all its textured glory. The simplicity of the marble base and pristine white shade only accentuate its sculpted finesse.

item.g:title: Table lamp 3082 - gold
item.g:description: Inspired by nature’s beauty. The textured brushed gold leaf-like accents are offset with a snowy white, streamlined linen drum shade.

item.g:title: Table lamp 2930 - black + gold
item.g:description: Featuring a geometric metallic base and a classic white linen drum shade, accessorise the room with this table lamp’s bold, modern simplicity.

item.g:title: Geometric shape table dÉcor - gold
item.g:description: Angular bursts of warm gold available in 3 sizes elevate your living space. Harness the power of simplicity with these geometric and stylish accents.

item.g:title: Table lamp branch - gold+black
item.g:description: Taking its cue from forms found in nature. Entwined twigs of brass rise from a stately black marble base topped off with an ivory drum shade.

item.g:title: Table lamp oval base - gold
item.g:description: A sculptural presence, the soft matte sheen of brass frames an open oval centre and is finished with a beautiful warm ivory shade.

item.g:title: Tray gold and black - gold+black
item.g:description: A luxurious blend of marble and metal, black and gold. This stunner makes for elegant entertaining with its looped handle, soft circumference and sweeping symmetry.

item.g:title: Cairn candle holder brass
item.g:description: The dramatic sculptural Cairn candle holder pairs beautifully with both classic or contemporary décor with its rustic antique brass finish.

item.g:title: Arnaldo platter set of 2 - antique brown
item.g:description: Fashioned from steel and finished in mottled bronze, this antiquey pair is an elegant accent to any coffee table, console or vanity.

item.g:title: Glassward table dÉcor grey and gold
item.g:description: This elegant chimney-shaped glassware collection accented with grey gold copper trim blends together natural form and modern design.

item.g:title: Adriano coffee table
item.g:description: Adriano - sleek and sophisticated with just a hint of Art Deco allure. The clean lines and minimal aesthetic of the table with a square of smoky walnut encased in a brushed brass frame contrasts light and shadow, wood and metal in a simple yet iconic design.

item.g:title: Desk horse table dÉcor antique brass
item.g:description: An homage to equestrian heritage. Crafted from antique brass, this beautiful horse silhouette on black marble is a contemporary classic.

item.g:title: Candle holder white marble and agate
item.g:description: Let impeccable style light the way with these wonderfully elegant candle holders, finished with polished gold detailing on a white marble and agate base.

item.g:title: Clear glass vase
item.g:description: Dramatic and versatile, vases in 3 sizes are beautifully frosted, catching the light in the perfect play of texture and gloss.

item.g:title: Table dÉcor looking left
item.g:description: Artistic intrigue can make all the difference to your interior styling. A unique collection of fine detailing of the human form crafted from a stunning contrast of textured bronze and polished marble.

item.g:title: Table dÉcor push on
item.g:description: Artistic intrigue can make all the difference to your interior styling. A unique collection of fine detailing of the human form crafted from a stunning contrast of textured bronze and polished marble.

item.g:title: Table dÉcor ring sporting woman
item.g:description: Artistic intrigue can make all the difference to your interior styling. A unique collection of fine detailing of the human form crafted from a stunning contrast of textured bronze and polished marble.

item.g:title: Candleholder glass and gold
item.g:description: Casting delightful shadows, glass encased lanterns in delicate gilded wire cages look impressive as a solo feature, and stunning in a cluster.

item.g:title: Sculpture tiger gold with crystal base
item.g:description: A decadent display of feline form postured over an orb of fine crystal. Luxury design for the contemporary home.

item.g:title: Desktop dÉcor gold+clear
item.g:description: Make a sculpted statement with contemporary metal crafted symbols brushed in gold and displayed to perfection on elegant clear crystal bases.

item.g:title: Cut out cast clock brass - brass+black
item.g:description: This exclusive analog time piece adds presence to sheer spaces. Minimalist black metal marks time on a brushed face finished in antique brass.

item.g:title: Candle holder metallic gold
item.g:description: With a statuesque presence, these brushed gold pillar candle holders are available in 3 sizes. Exquisite in a cluster, these accent pieces also have enough presence to stand alone.

item.g:title: Desktop sculpture gold bird with crystal base
item.g:description: A set of songbirds in muted brushed gold perched atop clear tapered crystal is whimsical yet sophisticated all at the same time.

item.g:title: U shaped candle stick holder gold
item.g:description: Beautiful balance and sleek symmetry define the spectacular U Shaped Handle Holder that brings fluidity and intrigue to every table.

item.g:title: Candle holder in marble with gold base
item.g:description: A divine combination of material and texture. These candle holders exude luxury with exquisite ash marble poised effortlessly on brushed gold.

item.g:title: Silent man sculpture
item.g:description: Ironically, the Silent Man is cause for many a conversation. An undeniable presence, this negative space bronze sculpture sits atop beautiful variegated black marble.

item.g:title: Jumping horse gold with marble base
item.g:description: Frozen in motion, this rearing horse accent in plated brass and natural marble base is ornate in design and exquisite in detail.

item.g:title: Shirlie coffee table walnut
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 30TH DECEMBER How lush is this low slung beauty? A pair of nestled coffee tables that glams up any living space with its smoky walnut veneer surface tops perched on glamorous brushed brass legs. Purity of form and unexpected design, Shirley can only be described as oh-so-chic.

item.g:title: Gianni side table
item.g:description: Modern minimalism meets structural chic. Nothing is quite as impressive or speaks of sophistication more eloquently than the Gianni Side Table - a transcendent monolithic piece encased in brushed brass with a smoky walnut finish top.

item.g:title: Cataleya end table
item.g:description: ESTIMATED DELIVERY ON 10TH NOVEMBER This round-shaped beauty might well be your cup of tea. With the top made of Victoria natural marble and the base in MDF walnut veneer, it is sure to add glamour to your living room.

item.g:title: Gianni side table white marble
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 10TH NOVEMBER Modern minimalism meets structural chic. Nothing is quite as impressive or speaks of sophistication more eloquently than the Gianni Side Table - a transcendent monolithic piece encased in brushed brass with a while marble surface.

item.g:title: Shirlie side table
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 10TH NOVEMBER Curated and crafted for the contemporary home, Shirlie’s unexpected silhouette leans towards modernistic minimalism. Fashioned from chocolatey walnut veneer and buffed brass, this side table adds luxe to your living room.

item.g:title: Shirlie coffee table black
item.g:description: How lush is this low slung beauty? A pair of nestled coffee tables that glams up any living space with its smoky walnut veneer surface tops perched on glamorous brushed brass legs. Purity of form and unexpected design, Shirley can only be described as oh-so-chic.

item.g:title: Evandro long corner sofa
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 30TH DECEMBER An expression of clean geometry and contemporary craftsmanship, Evandro is tantalisingly inviting. It’s generous proportions crafted in plush fabric, goose down cushioning and beautiful cross-stitch detail, make this sophisticated sectional the exemplar of comfort and understated style.

item.g:title: Spruzzatura a colori 2
item.g:description: A dramatic addition to any home that enjoys contemporary art with an edge. This hand-painted acrylic makes a striking composition of bold lines and vibrant colours.

item.g:title: Spruzzatura a colori 3
item.g:description: Minimalistic in its design, the handmade canvas captures fluid movement of brown and white swirls mounted on a wood finished frame.

item.g:title: Spruzzatura a colori 4
item.g:description: An intriguing dance across canvas. Minimalistic in its design, this canvas introduces the elements of water and fuidity into your home.

item.g:title: Spruzzatura a colori 5
item.g:description: A sultry presence, sensuous swirls of red, white and black injects instant glamour and vitality to your space.

item.g:title: Woman face right oil painting
item.g:description: A mesmerising mixture of techniques atop canvas using a blend of elements and colour that add dimension to your space.

item.g:title: Woman face left oil painting
item.g:description: A mesmerising mixture of techniques atop canvas using a blend of elements and colour that add dimension to your space.

item.g:title: Zebra oil painting
item.g:description: Add a sense of adventure and glamour to your space with the hand painted stretched canvas framed in silver.

item.g:title: Tempesta interna
item.g:description: Textured shades of the ocean with hints of gold. This hand painted wall art soothes the soul.

item.g:title: Bird oil painting 1
item.g:description: A nature-inspired oil painting with a calming, pleasing palette of deep blues, rich greens and deliberate strokes that only enhance your contemporary style and space.

item.g:title: Bird oil painting 2
item.g:description: A nature-inspired oil painting with a calming, pleasing palette of deep blues, rich greens and deliberate strokes that only enhance your contemporary style and space.

item.g:title: Rettangolo in resina
item.g:description: An abstract flow of lines with rich hues breaking through the black and white. A modern art abstract that lends intrigue and energy to your space.

item.g:title: Rettangolo in resina 2
item.g:description: An abstract flow of lines with rich hues breaking through the black and white. A modern art abstract that lends intrigue and energy to your space.

item.g:title: Crackle
item.g:description: A classic black and white abstract that enriches the room with inspiration. Timelessly chic - it makes quite the impact.

item.g:title: Woman painting
item.g:description: A gorgeous depiction of expressionism, the textural canvas piece embellished with gold foil and neutral colours blend beautifully with both conventional and contemporary interiors.

item.g:title: Zebra facing left painting
item.g:description: Add a sense of adventure and glamour to your space with the hand painted stretched canvas framed in silver.

item.g:title: Zebra facing right painting
item.g:description: Add a sense of adventure and glamour to your space with the hand painted stretched canvas framed in silver.

item.g:title: Deer painting 1
item.g:description: Create an intriguing aesthetic and monochrome mood with this handsomely hand-painted canvas that celebrates nature in all its beauty.

item.g:title: Deer painting 2
item.g:description: Create an intriguing aesthetic and monochrome mood with this handsomely hand-painted canvas that celebrates nature in all its beauty.

item.g:title: Clock resin painting
item.g:description: Inspired by the microcosm of a timepiece and steampunk nostalgia. The printed artform is rendered in resin and embellished with a slim gold foiled frame.

item.g:title: Libellula
item.g:description: Set the tone with this vivid papillon print. A sultry monochrome accentuated with gold foil creates a graceful, contemporary focus to the room.

item.g:title: Foglia d'oro
item.g:description: A dynamic and bold piece of art with gold leaf composition. The attention to detail and sophisticated symmetry allows for vast interpretation.

item.g:title: Leaf resin painting
item.g:description: A dynamic and bold piece of art with gold leaf composition. The attention to detail and sophisticated symmetry allows for vast interpretation.

item.g:title: City resin painting
item.g:description: Inspired by dynamic movement and pops of colour, City Resin gives expressive shape to the urban scape with gold foil detailing for texture and dimension.

item.g:title: Fioriere 1
item.g:description: A mixed media dramatic wall piece, evocative of botanical silhouettes against washes of earth and sky tones. A dramatic accent that’s both eclectic and modern.

item.g:title: Fioriere 2
item.g:description: A mixed media dramatic wall piece, evocative of botanical silhouettes against washes of earth and sky tones. A dramatic accent that’s both eclectic and modern.

item.g:title: Fioriere 3
item.g:description: A mixed media dramatic wall piece, evocative of botanical silhouettes against washes of earth and sky tones. A dramatic accent that’s both eclectic and modern.

item.g:title: Fiore di swamp 1
item.g:description: Contours of colour give expression to this exquisite abstract. The mesmerizing print lends dramatic accent a whole room, mounted on a sleep gold frame.

item.g:title: Fiore di swamp 2
item.g:description: Contours of colour give expression to this exquisite abstract. The mesmerizing print lends dramatic accent a whole room, mounted on a sleep gold frame.

item.g:title: Dell'oceano
item.g:description: A stippled effect statement piece with serene composition suggestive of a dramatic landscape. Rich with depth and detail, and elegantly displayed in gold gilded frame.

item.g:title: Ventoso
item.g:description: A stippled effect statement piece with serene composition suggestive of a dramatic landscape. Rich with depth and detail, and elegantly displayed in gold gilded frame.

item.g:title: Parabrezza
item.g:description: Wonderfully powerful, this black and white abstract with the subtlest hints of gold is a timeless and sophisticated statement that every large space needs.

item.g:title: Sughetti torti
item.g:description: Wonderfully powerful, this black and white abstract with the subtlest hints of gold is a timeless and sophisticated statement that every large space needs.

item.g:title: Sugli diamanti
item.g:description: Wonderfully powerful, this black and white abstract with the subtlest hints of gold is a timeless and sophisticated statement that every large space needs.

item.g:title: Cubico
item.g:description: A powerful monochrome piece with a window of vivacious colour and gold leaf texture. Add drama and command attention to a space with the total abstraction of this oversized artwork.

item.g:title: Cubico 2
item.g:description: A powerful monochrome piece with a window of vivacious colour and gold leaf texture. Add drama and command attention to a space with the total abstraction of this oversized artwork.

item.g:title: Canvas painting
item.g:description: Earthy yet ethereal, fill a feature wall with a hand painted canvas that creates a richly layered and atmospheric composition and leaves serenity in its wake.

item.g:title: Large hurricane
item.g:description: A textured base with distressed brass finish and clear glass chimney transform the ambience with its modern classic silhouette and cosy ‘hygge’ effect.

item.g:title: Glass vase
item.g:description: Glazed teal dissolves into warm gold in stunning ombre effect. Inspired by the Greek amphora, this piece is spectacular on its own and also makes a lovely fresh flower display.

item.g:title: Textured bowl
item.g:description: Minimalist in design, this metal ware centerpiece is crafted with seamless curves contrasted with intricately ridged textures. A simple silhouette that makes a striking accent piece for a coffee table or console.

item.g:title: Fish resin painting
item.g:description: There’s almost movement to be seen in this vibrant museum-quality print. Framed in a delicate gold foiled aluminium, this prosaic piece is uniquely you.

item.g:title: Yellow fish resin painting
item.g:description: There’s almost movement to be seen in this vibrant museum-quality print. Framed in a delicate gold foiled aluminium, this prosaic piece is uniquely you.

item.g:title: Anima del fiore
item.g:description: An elegant print of geometric design, nuanced with earth colours and intricate depth. Coated with resin in a delicately gold foiled frame, find balance between the traditional and contemporary.

item.g:title: Anima del fiore 2
item.g:description: An elegant print of geometric design, nuanced with earth colours and intricate depth. Coated with resin in a delicately gold foiled frame, find balance between the traditional and contemporary.

item.g:title: Anima del fiore 3
item.g:description: An elegant print of geometric design, nuanced with earth colours and intricate depth. Coated with resin in a delicately gold foiled frame, find balance between the traditional and contemporary.

item.g:title: Round mirror
item.g:description: A sunburst silhouette in antique gold finish. It’s intricate detail makes this piece a must-have style statement.

item.g:title: Round ceiling lamp
item.g:description: A striking piece of functional design with distinctive sculptural appeal. A pendant lamp adorned with suspended cymbal in a brushed brass finish that refracts warm light across the room.

item.g:title: Led table lamp geometric
item.g:description: Of unconventional design and sculptural sophistication, the Geometric Table Lamp outlined in brass with a satin-finish glass sphere diffuses intrigue and ambient lights.

item.g:title: Square wall mirror
item.g:description: With simple lines and uncomplicated design, this geometric frame in an antique gold finish is distinguished in every detail.

item.g:title: Round leaf mirror
item.g:description: A sunburst silhouette in antique gold finish. It’s intricate detail makes this piece a must-have style statement.

item.g:title: Framed wall mirror
item.g:description: Creating a sense of artistry on your wall, the geometric Framed Wall Mirror reflects high impact and contemporary aesthetic in an antique gold finish.

item.g:title: Decorative wall mirror
item.g:description: A sunburst silhouette in antique gold finish. It’s intricate detail makes this piece a must-have style statement.

item.g:title: Round decorative mirror
item.g:description: A substantial vintage glam piece that’s easily the focal point of the room with an antique gold frame and breakaway twig silhouette.

item.g:title: Round flower vase - set of 2
item.g:description: A dynamic pair. These beautifully shaped vases in a buttery gold finish are absolutely enchanting.

item.g:title: Textured platter
item.g:description: A chic finishing touch to any interior, grooved gold platters with deep asymmetric curves make a wonderfully contemporary home accent.

item.g:title: Led table lamp
item.g:description: Crafted with glass in a smoky hue, the LED Table Lamp has contemporary appeal that radiates soft ambient light.

item.g:title: Leaf platter
item.g:description: A chic finishing touch to any interior, these gold platters make a wonderfully contemporary home accent.

item.g:title: Rhino
item.g:description:
An adorable, super-soft selection of children’s toys in a range of squeezable designs.
When it comes to stuffed animals, our little kingdom of friends comes in pure cotton and yarn, embellished with adorable detail. Bring your child's imagination to life with the perfect playtime pal and cuddle companion.

item.g:title: Seal
item.g:description:
An adorable, super-soft selection of children’s toys in a range of squeezable designs.
When it comes to stuffed animals, our little kingdom of friends comes in pure cotton and yarn, embellished with adorable detail. Bring your child's imagination to life with the perfect playtime pal and cuddle companion.

item.g:title: Long pendant lamp
item.g:description: A striking piece of functional design with distinctive sculptural appeal. A pendant lamp adorned with suspended cymbal in a brushed brass finish that refracts warm light across the room.

item.g:title: Round pendant lamp
item.g:description: A striking piece of functional design with distinctive sculptural appeal. A pendant lamp adorned with suspended cymbal in a brushed brass finish that refracts warm light across the room.

item.g:title: Fly horse black gold
item.g:description: Rearing in unbridled magnificence. With intricate detail and ethereal design, this iron and natural black marble beauty is an iconic collectable.

item.g:title: Partridge on branch sculpture
item.g:description: An adorable partridge perched on a branch in clean, minimal form. Fashioned in warm gold with a crystal base, add charming allure to your space.

item.g:title: Desktop sculpture
item.g:description: A wonderfully quirky piece that sparks delightful conversation. Accessorise your space with this playful accent foiled in gold on a black marble base.

item.g:title: Hand large
item.g:description: An intricate and hauntingly powerful figurine that evokes contemplation. Cast in iron and coated in bronze.

item.g:title: Dinosaur
item.g:description:
An adorable, super-soft selection of children’s toys in a range of squeezable designs.
When it comes to stuffed animals, our little kingdom of friends comes in pure cotton and yarn, embellished with adorable detail. Bring your child's imagination to life with the perfect playtime pal and cuddle companion.

item.g:description:

When it comes to stuffed animals, our little kingdom of friends comes in pure cotton and yarn, embellished with adorable detail. Bring your child's imagination to life with the perfect playtime pal and cuddle companion.

item.g:title: Music stand
item.g:description: A fusion of luxury living with contemporary sensibilities. The three dimensional Music Stand is composed of steel plated in soft gold and displayed on a slab of black marble.

item.g:title: Hyadd coffee table
item.g:description: Crafted from black rubberwood and covered with stilo walnut veneer, this design lends a traditional charm to your space.

item.g:title: Sandrino coffee table
item.g:description: Bring traditional style to any space with this eye-catching coffee table, showcasing natural elm wood top and a frame made of stainless steel finished with gold copper.

item.g:title: Bolton coffee table
item.g:description: The Bolton is a classic piece of art. Though the design is driven by simplicity, it beautifies any space that it occupies.

item.g:title: Cloe coffee table
item.g:description: A contemporary centerpiece with a yin yang of colour and texture. Marbled porcelain and chocolaty oak with touches of warm brass add the perfect amount of elegant detail and glam to your living space.

item.g:title: Kaira coffee table
item.g:description: Impeccable stylish, Kaira features a tawny glass top and glossy lacquered base encased in a rounded frame crafted from brass plated steel in a pipe style. It’s architectural attitude is defined by a bold silhouette and sculptural shapes.

item.g:title: Rando coffee table
item.g:description: With its low profile, streamlined silhouette, and mix of materials, Rando blends into a variety of décor styles in all its chic versatility. Ingenious in design, this table is crafted from a mix of dark bronze and natural wood grain, with inset wraparound shelving for discrete nooks and stowage

item.g:title: Nolan coffee table
item.g:description: Mixed-media, height-staggered and so on-point. The Nolan Coffee Table is where function meets fashion. Crafted from dark-stained wood, matt black melamine and contrasted with the glint of glass, the resulting piece transcends any space with its architectural design and detail.

item.g:title: Pixel side table
item.g:description: A bold choice, the Pixel Side Table is a vision of duality with its geometric shapes and asymmetric style. The glossy black and white table top with brushed brass detail adds the luxury factor to this whimsical piece.

item.g:title: Travolta coffee table
item.g:description: Styled for perpetuity, Travolta’s architectural attitude is simple and svelte in a rich square span of dark walnut that hovers over a brushed frame of warm brass. The epitome of urban charm and undeniable verve.

item.g:title: Sage coffee table
item.g:description: Sage nestled tables have oodles of oomph! This set crafted from walnut veneer features antique-finished brass legs and smooth, essential lines. Its signature composition lends artful perfection and balance to the room.

item.g:title: Savina coffee table
item.g:description: EXPECTED DELIVERY BY 30TH OCTOBER First, the base. Like the swirl of a Flamenco dancer’s skirt, is this intriguing lineup of hand contoured wood strips, built piece by painstaking piece on to a brass platform. The top is a slice of subtly grained marble. All in all Savina is a performance art.

item.g:title: Michela coffee table
item.g:description: EXPECTED DELIVERY BY 30TH NOVEMBER It’s taken thousands of years to create this wild play of white and colour streaks in black marble. Refined, yet raw. Polished, yet primal. The hand-contoured walnut base mirrors a wave of energy frozen in time. Michela Coffee, electrified.

item.g:title: Arnold coffee table
item.g:description: Style and convenience – what more could you want? Create a functional centerpiece in your living room while adding stunning design and beauty with this coffee table that comes with Yellow Hole Natural Marble top.

item.g:title: Caleb coffee table
item.g:description: The Caleb Coffee Table sits unassumingly at the center of your living room, quietly adding to the décor. Its top is made of natural grey marble, while the base is brass plated.

item.g:title: Ciara coffee table
item.g:description: An appreciation of simple geometry, the Ciara Coffee Table cantilevered metal frame in brushed brass blends seamlessly into its circular veined marble surface.

item.g:title: Gianni coffee table
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 10TH OF NOVEMBER Modern minimalism meets structural chic. Nothing is quite as impressive or speaks of sophistication more eloquently than the Gianni Coffee Table - a transcendent monolithic piece encased in brushed brass with a while marble surface.

item.g:title: Glam coffee table
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 10TH NOVEMBER There’s an art to making your space truly individual - we would start with the Glam Coffee Table. In sleek and staggered dimension, low-slung drum contours of brushed brass float atop setback dark wood in sensationally decorative platforms that would look divine in your luxurious lounge.

item.g:title: Goya side table glass top
item.g:description: Redefine your space with a glamorous focal point that is the Goya Coffee Table. Reminiscent of an antiquated café table with contemporary flair, the dark glass tabletop stands enhanced on an elegant copper pedestal.

item.g:title: Goya side table marble top
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 10TH NOVEMBER Goya balances timeless elegance and iconic style. Formed of a copper stem that splays into a crisp white marble top accented with deep grey veining, this side table brings subdued sophistication to the room.

item.g:title: Cataleya coffee table
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 10TH NOVEMBER The striking Cataleya Coffee Table is innately contemporary with touches of timeless style. The luxe Victoria marble top contrasts beautifully with warm walnut skirting and glorious geometry to make for a minimalist piece that is both perfectly practical and a gorgeous display.

item.g:title: Vespa coffee table
item.g:description: Vespa proves to be riveting in any living space. Timeless with a wonderfully modern aesthetic, the smooth edged rectangular marble surface and column pedestal is a vision in white.

item.g:title: Vera chair
item.g:description: Vera’s clean-lined and current design is sized for small nooks and focal corners. Gentle arcs and organic curves encased in tactile textile, this piece is beautifully understated.

item.g:title: Renee
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 10TH NOVEMBER This whimsical piece has the air of retro chic to it. Textile upholstery in hues that ranges from mustard, aqua and blush to shades of chrome, Renee is rather individualistic and exudes a groovy vintage vibe.

item.g:title: Selena chair
item.g:description: The soft barrel design of this organic seamless silhouette is worthy of attention. As delightful as it is luxurious, Selena sets the stage for a compelling and contemporary space.

item.g:title: Shelley chair
item.g:description: Ever so inviting, Shelley boasts an airy profile and deep seat to languish in over candid conversation. It’s versatile and elegant design complements any style of décor.

item.g:title: Molly chair
item.g:description: Evocative of Scandinavian design in its minimalistic and avant garde way, Molly has a bold sense of style. Its cut out, clean lines and easy contours add character and modernity to any room.

item.g:title: Oroman chair
item.g:description: Oroman’s contemporary and edgy style is a talking point. A modern piece crafted from tangerine orange leather and smooth chrome, the Oroman is a reflection of your individuality.

item.g:title: Lugano chair
item.g:description: Lugano lounge chairs have a distinctive soft scalloped profile and deep plump seats that lures you in. With a blend of luxury, visual appeal and unrivalled attention to detail, this iconic design is uber comfy and elevates your space.

item.g:title: Miller chair
item.g:description: The cocoon-shaped Miller is like being wrapped in the cozy comfort of a giant hug. Perched on a brushed gold girdle base and draped in exquisite fabric that feels as good as it looks - this is what makes a room truly distinctive.

item.g:title: Odea chair
item.g:description: The lounge chair features languishing curves that cradle and comfort. Fully enveloped in fabric with honey-like texture, Odea is roomy enough to curl up in with a good book.

item.g:title: Queen chair
item.g:description: Add instant glam to any room! Swathed in gorgeous pastel fabrics from head to toe, Queen wraparound seating is completely captivating, literally and figuratively.

item.g:title: Hank chair
item.g:description:
Airing on the eclectic, Hank’s cantilevered frame boasts neutral palettes and prominent minimalism.
While inspired by classic cues, its evolved style and use of textures make it a piece of interest that breathes life into a room.

item.g:title: Hero chair
item.g:description: Make a space truly distinctive with this spectacular accent piece that steals the spotlight. Structured and snug by design, its deep seat and slender silhouette wrap you up in comfort.

item.g:title: Josie chair
item.g:description: Inviting, isn’t it? Josey is all about the detail with elegant proportions, meticulously tailored exposed stitching and rich grained leather. Elevate a room to a sanctuary with its eloquent design and deep comfort.

item.g:title: Elvina chair
item.g:description: Sit back and soak it all in. Alert and ergonomic when upright, Edwina sinks back into reclined bliss, smooth as butter. Functional style is what we strive for and Elvina is a perfect example of that.

item.g:title: Edwina chair
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 30TH DECEMBER Paying homage to the refined elegance and streamlined simplicity of the iconic cantilever form, is the timeless Edwina. Upholstered in crisp channel tufted natural fabric and framed with a beautiful antique brass trim finish, this piece is all sorts of suave.

item.g:title: Flutura chair
item.g:description: Clever and flawless in design, this splendid objet d'art makes a bold statement adding depth and personality to a room. Clad in curved walnut veneer and chrome-coloured leather, Flutura exudes quiet drama.

item.g:title: Forest chair
item.g:description: When less is always more - pared down, straight lines and a geometric silhouette distinguishes Forest. Clean and concise, it’s the go-to that compliments contemporary decorating style with understated flair.

item.g:title: Creed chair
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 31ST OCTOBER An evolution of the classic wingback, Creed cuts a striking silhouette where ever it may be. Its restrained curves and high functionality fit right in – from private office or media room to experiential breakout spaces.

item.g:title: Damon chair
item.g:description: Find yourself ensconced in the classic comfort of the high back and wing tipped Damon armchair. A relaxing retreat with enticing proportions and generously cushioned set beckons.

item.g:title: Davis chair
item.g:description: A contemporary masterpiece with a certain je ne sais quoi, this whimsical high back would look a dream in any space. Perched atop a swivel base in brushed gold, Davis meets every desire of function and form.

item.g:title: Edward chair
item.g:description: Contoured construction with accents of vintage glamour. The ‘architexture’ is a delightful amalgam of rich leather, quilted fabric cushions and smooth titanium that adds dimension and amps up the cool factor to any room.

item.g:title: Baldwin chair
item.g:description: A svelte silhouette, understated geometry and juxtaposition of texture. This timeless mid-century piece makes for a versatile statement to any space. Whether a standalone objet d'art to a modern living room, or paired with period furniture in the study.

item.g:title: Belisima chair
item.g:description: With its seamless shape and cut-out contours, Belisima is exquisite as it is comfortable. Sink into its wraparound embrace, upholstered in luxe beige leather with the subtlest of pink undertones.

item.g:title: Beck recliner chair
item.g:description: Dive right in. Low slung and deep seated, Beck envelopes you in the kind of cushioned comfort that makes it the best seat in the house! The roomy two-toned recliner exudes warm style and laid-back comfort at the press of a button.

item.g:title: Bernadi chair
item.g:description: A mechanised recliner of superb quality, construction and finish. The Bernadi boasts a trendy profile that stakes its claim to any minimalistic space, while the welted custom leather upholstery adds depth and dimension to the room.

item.g:title: Casa chair
item.g:description: The graceful curves to this revamped horseshoe style results in a glamorous standalone armchair. Casa employs clean-meets-classic design that makes itself at home in contemporary as well as traditional interiors.

item.g:title: Class chair
item.g:description: Evocative of the traditional barrel chair, this conversation starter brings effortlessly chic vibes to any home. Fully upholstered in plush fabric, covet its fluid silhouette and crisp curves from every angle.

item.g:title: Claude chair
item.g:description: Reminiscent of Mad Men’s iconic retro-chic design, the lounge and ottoman set in leather flanked with exposed oak puts the comfort and cool factor into contemporary design.

item.g:title: Magnum sofa set
item.g:description: Magnum force. The elements: Chesterfield style tufted platform. Individual inclined backrests. Slab armrests with bolsters. Welted edges in standout tones. Solid beech and stainless steel in shine smoked fnish. Prepare to make an impact with the dynamically styled Magnum Sofa.

item.g:title: New quatro sofa set
item.g:description: Flexibility is a wonderful thing. Quatro adapts to your need of the moment with extendable arms and retractable, tiltable backs which let you configure your seating around as you please.

item.g:title: Liva sofa set
item.g:description: Liva brings a striking sense of originality, wearing a layered look with quilt jacketed armrests and pillars, anchored in brushed gold footers. Self coloured welting defines the clean linear edges while the subtle nap of the fabric lends lively luminosity.

item.g:title: Dubai sofa set
item.g:description: Beautifully contoured and intricate in design. The silvery grey upholstery takes an alluring stance with enchanting Arabesque stitch detail and gold cinched base for a stunning finishing touch that accentuates the sofas soft, fluid lines.

item.g:title: Xavier sofa set
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 10TH NOVEMBER There are two sides to every story, and the Xavier Sofa is an engaging one. The sides and back feature a waffle patterned finish that's all the rage. You can't miss the burnished gold frame either. Come around to the front, and deep welted cushions invite you to sink in. You'll wonder how a silhouette so elegant could hold something so sumptuous.

item.g:title: Zeenat sofa set
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 30TH OCTOBER Zeenat. Geometry at play. Elegant backrest cushion lines slope divergently against the waffled wafer wraparounds to express a refreshing sense of playfulness. The beige and light grey colour scheme emphasizes the contrast while deep seating cushions anchor it all.

item.g:title: Valentina sofa set
item.g:description: EXPECTED DELIVERY BY 10TH OCTOBER The Valentina collection transcends the ordinary with an uncompromising sense of luxury and glamour. Textural silky smooth cushioning and rich detailed quilting are accented by dramatic angular steel legs. The metallic finish against the fawn plush textile ooze sophistication.

item.g:title: Vivante 4 seater sofa
item.g:description: Vivante is about being vibrantly alive. The colour energizes. Relax with this rechargable electric recliner whose contours support you with enthusiastic neck and lumbar support while perfectly angled arms drain the stress off your shoulders.

item.g:title: Sloane sectional sofa
item.g:description: Your next style breakthrough is just around the corner. With a hand stitched ribbed jacket casually slung over a solid wood frame, the Sloane Sectional knows how to put people at ease without trying too hard.

item.g:title: Tifany 3.5 seater
item.g:description: Taut curves, soft shades. Grand scale, little touches. Tifany is a delightful study in combinations. Walnut armrests that wrap around the back. Central Ottmans that open up into coffee tables. All set to take centre stage in large living rooms.

item.g:title: Rochelle sofa set
item.g:description: Quilted for style. Built for life. Rochelle is elegantly engaging with those unique braids in wool-textured hard-wearing polyester fabric in cool grey and deep teal. Go monochrome or pair them up.

item.g:title: Sephora
item.g:description: Smooth as stream washed pebbles, the flowing lines of the softly contoured Sephora invite you to settle in and let your thoughts ripple by. Even the armrest position is effortless.

item.g:title: Shaliston sofa set
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 25TH OCTOBER Strength underlies svelte lines as Shaliston brings it all together. The resilience of special high-density foam. The silent support of solid larch wood. Rose gold that tinges the tubular structure with a touch of drama.

item.g:title: Quatro sofa set
item.g:description: Flexibility is a wonderful thing. Quatro adapts to your need of the moment with extendable arms and retractable, tiltable backs which let you configure your seating around as you please.

item.g:title: Rochelle corner sofa
item.g:description: Quilted for style. Built for life. Rochelle is elegantly engaging with those unique braids in wool-textured hard-wearing polyester fabric in cool grey and deep teal. Go monochrome or pair them up.

item.g:title: Mia sofa
item.g:description: Contemporary furniture doesn't get more glam than this. Channeling the golden age of Hollywood, Mia is all seduction with luscious Monroesque curves and a striking dress sense that's all tied up with a bold gold hemline.

item.g:title: Jarah sofa set
item.g:description: If the idea of a loungefest appeals to you, Jarah draws you in for a closer look. Deep and ample, for the really long legged and for those who like settling in for the long haul. Notice how the seating cushion flows effortlessly over, with an edgleless profile that makes for greater comfort. Armless, so it doesn't cramp your style.

item.g:title: Lauren corner sofa
item.g:description: Lauren's got it all. Plush, comfy seating, loose soft back cushions and a luxurious chaise extension that invites you to lounge. Lined with goose down feathers, it's what jealously guarded corners are made of.

item.g:title: Karolina sofa set
item.g:description: Karolina has an effortlessly self assured air with a clean, confident profile and innate style. Designed for long-haul comfort with adjustable headrests and back-friendly cushions lined with goose down feather.

item.g:title: Irina corner sofa
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 31ST OCTOBER Beautifully streamlined, low slung with a boat-like profile, down to the hull-like back that flows right around. Presented in the tones of sand and surf, Irina evokes the yachting lifestyle.

item.g:title: Irina 4 seater sofa
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 31ST OCTOBER Beautifully streamlined, low slung with a boat-like profile, down to the hull-like back that flows right around. Presented in the tones of sand and surf, Irina evokes the yachting lifestyle.

item.g:title: Fritzel 2 seater with ottoman
item.g:description: With clean lines, a compact footprint and an effortless sense of style, Fritzel represents the spirit of contemporary design. Innovative in its simplicity, it pairs a nifty two seater with a minimalist Ottoman, to define a space for relaxing conversations.

item.g:title: Gemma sofa set
item.g:description: The fashionably contemporary Gemma Sofa tweaks the essential tuxedo silhouette with assymetrically trapezoid sides, giving it just the right touch of nowness. Solid wood brings underlying strength to the slim, svelte structure.

item.g:title: Ekat sofa set
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 10TH NOVEMBER As a bold, assertive style statement, Ekat totally makes the cut. Gold bands snap across striking rectangular forms, standing out against the smoothness of silk and the plushness of velvet - fine textures that defines the tuxedo sofa look.

item.g:title: Ellise sofa set
item.g:description: Svelte and styled in the nubuck look, all zipped up and ready to go, the Ellise Sofa nails the sartorial style for contemporary furniture that's always dressed for the time of day, whatever that may be. Big selvedge cushions and zippers in standout orange make quite the statement.

item.g:title: Elqenna sofa set
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 30TH OCTOBER Soft pastels and svelte curves whisper, smooth and sensuous. Like the lilt of the name, Elqenna sets a tone of lyrical grace. Easy on the eye, with the cosiness of goose down. Don't miss the legs - a quirky little tribute to New York's Art Deco skyscrapers

item.g:title: Domonique sectional sofa set
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 30TH OCTOBER A beautifully nuanced set, Domonique is full of treats for the discerning eye. Diamond-quilted leather beckons you closer to reveal interlinked chains, and then lets you step back and admire how it flows around. Organic, kidney-shaped seating defines those exclusive circles.

item.g:title: Bram chair
item.g:description: Avant garde, experimental yet ergonomic, playful yet practical in the way its profile wraps around a deeply accomodating posture. Bram. A chair with attitude.

item.g:title: Candice sofa set
item.g:description: Contoured for comfort, Candice is built to be lived in, with its warmly welcoming curves layered with high-resilience foam and dirtproof, waterproof fabric . Gold finished steel legs show that simplicity can be grounded in style.

item.g:title: Brio sofa set
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 25TH OCTOBER Fine leather, gold finished steel, birch and duck down. Put them together with a dash of individualistic alchemy from our designers and you have the Brio Sofa. Waffled arcs, gold lines and sash create a luxurious presence while the seating angle is calibrated for relaxed alertness.

item.g:title: Bram 3 seater
item.g:description: Hand-stitched contrast piping defines the contemporary edge of a look that invokes a distinct mid-century sensibility. The Bram sofa. Velvet to the touch, anchored in titanium finished steel.

item.g:title: Banana sofa set
item.g:description: Effortlessly fluid curves make the Banana Sofa Set easy on the eye and easier to nestle in. Reflecting the aesthetic of contemporary architectural design, the biomorphic look, inspired by nature, has been brought to life by digital modeling and manufacturing techniques.

item.g:title: Travolta bed
item.g:description: With a simple silhouette and low profile, the Travolta Bed fits effortlessly into a millennial lifestyle. The trendy deep cushioned split headboard fuses form and function, inviting you to spend long hours as you sit, sleep, work and watch. The frame rests on yellow copper legs, anchoring this work of self assured style.

item.g:title: Overland bed + 2night stand
item.g:description: Overland. The name evokes adventure and journeys of discovery. Observe the headboard, let the mind travel, and you may sport a row of mountain peaks cresting the pattern and crisscrossing the visual scape. Defined in antique silver finished steel for peak impact.

item.g:title: Mirren bedroom set
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 31ST OCTOBER The winged headboard is a design classic. Mirren reimagines it to create an exciting profile with an enhanced feel of luxury and a beautifully ergonomic touch that makes it a joy to sit up, lean back and binge watch. The taupe and titanium scheme tops the style quotient.

item.g:title: Nandi bed
item.g:description: Join the dots. Classical romanticism. Chesterfield notes with button tufting and nailhead trim. Golden-age Hollywood glam in ivory leather. The Nandi Bed brings it all together as a truly luxurious experience that manages to stay light and expressive. Night stands in country-chic white finish, add to the eclectic charm of it all.

item.g:title: Roldan bed
item.g:description: Dotty about Art Deco? Look no further. The Roldan Bed, from profile to nailhead trim, is your dream redux of that magical age when design tried harder and influenced everything from sconces to skyscrapers. Light up the night with French flair.

item.g:title: Irma bedroom set
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 29TH OCTOBER

item.g:title: Marge bed + 2 night stand
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 25TH OCTOBER Marge celebrates the art of the headboard. The unique pleat pattern has been customized by our designers to bring a sense of restful energy with pyramidal forms interlocked into a rippling rhythm.

item.g:title: Kerry bed
item.g:description: Kerry is created for those who believe style is about not trying too hard. Its understated elegance brings instant comfort and warmth to any setting. Neat parallel lines enhance the sense of depth and space while sheer simplicity makes accessorizing effortless.

item.g:title: Belisima bed
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 10TH NOVEMBER You could call it the thinking person's bed. The smart headboard is a clever piece of ergonomics. Sit up to read or watch, and you'll wonder how a supportive headrest and thoughtfully contoured back just happened to fall in place. Belisima. The beauty of contemporary design.

item.g:title: Gayla bedroom set
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 10TH DECEMBER

item.g:title: Alexandra bedroom set
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 30TH SEPTEMBER Exuding an invitation to run your fingers along its grooves, the Alexandra Bed features a striking quilted finish.The exclusive waffle board pattern with buckled intersecting bands has been customised by our designers to play off the warm glow of rose gold against soft ivory tones.

item.g:title: Hariet bedroom set
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 15TH DECEMBER The beautifully kept secret of eternal youth. It is, in part, about the deep restfulness that great design brings with its soothing aesthetics. And it lies in the material that makes this precision-pleated headboard so special. Smart fabric. Looks and feels like suede, attracts admiration but repels everything else.

item.g:title: Wesley dining chair
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 30TH NOVEMBER The Wesley chairs are designed keeping contemporary aesthetics in mind. Featuring a circular wooden cutout as backrest, and high-quality cushion for utmost comfort, this chair is sure to get your interested.

item.g:title: Wesley dining table
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 30TH NOVEMBER Like crossing orbits in an imaginary solar system, Wesley's intriguingly overlapped gimbal circles bring together the worlds of design and culinary art for an exquisite new experience. Topped with glass or onyx marble, this is a statement piece that's light on the eye.

item.g:title: Wesley lobby table
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 30TH NOVEMBER Like crossing orbits in an imaginary solar system, Wesley's intriguingly overlapped gimbal circles bring together the worlds of design and culinary art for an exquisite new experience. Topped with glass or onyx marble, this is a statement piece that's light on the eye.

item.g:title: Terrence dining chair
item.g:description: A short-sized chair with a sleek, wooden back is out attempt at contemporizing your décor. The thick, comfortable cushion sits atop four simply shaped wooden legs.

item.g:title: Teddy dining chair
item.g:description: The Teddy collection is the epitome of comfort. The key highlight is the back extends to create a comfortable armrest. The thick fabric gives the chair a classy look.

item.g:title: Shayla side board
item.g:description: This storage piece pairs function with fashion, and beautifully blends with your other ensemble. Crafted from high-quality wood with walnut veneer covering and brass brushed finish, it makes for e perfect addition to your living space.

item.g:title: Savina dining table - 3 meter
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 10TH NOVEMBER First, the base. Like the swirl of a Flamenco dancer's skirt, is this intriguing lineup of hand contoured wood strips, built piece by painstaking piece on to a brass platform. The top is a slice of subtly grained marble. All in all Savina turns dining into a performance art.

item.g:title: Travolta dining table
item.g:description: Less is more. That's Travolta. Combining smoky walnut veneer with brass brushed stainless steel, this minimalistic piece brings dining to life with just the right amount of presence.

item.g:title: Travolta dining chair
item.g:description: A short-sized chair with a sleek, wooden back is out attempt at contemporizing your décor. The thick, comfortable cushion sits atop four simply shaped wooden legs.

item.g:title: Turin dining chair
item.g:description: This charming chair lends a touch of tailored appeal to your seating ensemble. Made with solid smoke oak and featuring comfortable seating, the Turin collection is an automatic choice for your dining space.

item.g:title: Robert dining table
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 10TH NOVEMBER Robert. A fresh take on contemporary dining with onyx, marble, American ash wood and steel finished in champagne gold. Pirouetting base pillars and offset chair backs create a playful vibe.

item.g:title: Norton dining chair
item.g:description: The Norton collection is the coming together of casual styling and traditional comfort. With flamboyant colours and durable build, this piece is a quirky addition to your space.

item.g:title: Savina dining chair
item.g:description: Charm and elegance adorn this luxurious dining chair complete with simple design and dignified form. Featuring comfortable cushioning, this chair is a must-have in every dining room.

item.g:title: Orabella dining chair
item.g:description: Presenting the Orabella collection for the out-of-the-box thinkers out there. The chair features a crazily-shaped back and a comfy cushion on the seat to provide a good balance of quirk and comfort.

item.g:title: Reina dining table
item.g:description: Can a jagged edge be smooth? Can polished marble exude raw energy? Reina Dining brings a dramatic profile with a massive slab of wave cut stone, buffed to an extraordinary gloss and supported on robust ash wood pillars.

item.g:title: Novane dining chair
item.g:description: Refresh your dining experience with this stylish chair. With a curved back and a soft seat, the Novanee provides great comfort.

item.g:title: Katherine dining table new
item.g:description: Katherine Dining is designed for the intersection of social and family circles. From a cheerful evening meal to home entertaining at its most exclusive, there’s a certain sense of style all around with hand finished circles of silver pear veneer.

item.g:title: Keegan console marble
item.g:description: The dance of diagonal planes. The rhythm of harmonised grain. Built on the geometric innovation that today’s computer-aided design brings to life, Keegan adds that special edge. Topped with romantic marble.

item.g:title: Keegan dining table glass top
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 10TH OCTOBER The dance of diagonal planes. The rhythm of harmonised grain. Built on the geometric innovation that today's computer-aided design brings to life, Keegan adds that special edge. Topped with clear glass for unobstructed effect.

item.g:title: Michela dining table
item.g:description: It's taken thousands of years to create this wild play of white and colour streaks in black marble. Refined, yet raw. Polished, yet primal. The hand-contoured walnut base mirrors a wave of energy frozen in time. Michela. Dining, electrified.

item.g:title: Keegan dining chair
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 10TH OF NOVEMBER The Keegan collection offers style to your décor and showcases a unique design. The comfortable seating sits on top of four wooden legs, while the colour easily blends with your current colour palette.

item.g:title: Kelvin dining chair
item.g:description: The Kelvin collection comes with plush polo club stone fabric and an antique bronze finish. It lends the quirk your dining room needed.

item.g:title: Michela dining chair
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY END OF SEPTEMBER This attractive chair has it all: style, comfort, and durability. Created with plush cushioning that encourages you to settle in and relax, it features a unique open-framed arm design. Comfortably padded seat and back cushions lend an elegant finishing touch.

item.g:title: Mia dining chair
item.g:description: The Mia brings to you the ultimate comfort in the form of soft arm rests and classy design. This makes the Mia arm chair a great addition to your dining room ensemble.

item.g:title: Hyadd dining chair
item.g:description: This is where traditional colours meet style. Presenting the Hyadd dining chair collection. Whether you are having a family time at the dining table or are entertaining guests outdoor, this dining chair is a great fit.

item.g:title: Icon dining chair
item.g:description: This is a minimalist approach to dining chairs. The Icon collection adds to the beauty of your interiors and makes heads turn.

item.g:title: Jared dining chair
item.g:description: With its pleasing colour it lends a contemporary appeal to any eating space. The legs that come with antique brass finish give the opulence your dining space needs.

item.g:title: Bosco dining table
item.g:description: Three points define a plane. Now what does that little geometry lesson have to do with this elegant piece? Everything. While the Bosco table invites you to gather around, the three-pointed star base extends its stabilizing support while staying out of the way. More space, more legroom, more reason to draw comfortably closer.

item.g:title: Cataleya dining chair
item.g:description: The Cataleya collection is a classic among dining chairs. A solid product made of smoke oak, with golden finish on the arm rest and on the back, places this piece of at the top of the our favourites.

item.g:title: Agnes dining chair
item.g:description: Transition in style with our versatile design. Our Agnes collection chair brings simple and contemporary style suit your taste. The antique brass finish on the chair and the slightly tapered legs complete the look.

item.g:title: Cataleya dining table glass
item.g:description: Sheet glass floats ever so lightly on hand-contoured scoops of walnut-finished ash wood. Walnut and champagne gold define the chairs and the cabinet as well. Cataleya Dining. Now served.

item.g:title: Cataleya dining table marble
item.g:description: DELIVERY BY 10TH NOVEMBER Victoria Marble floats on hand-contoured scoops of walnut-finished ash wood. Walnut and champagne gold define the chairs and the cabinet as well. Cataleya Dining. Now served.

item.g:title: Chiara round dining table
item.g:description: Chiara presents the wonderfully sociable advantages of circular dining in fine smoked oak. Gather around for a cosy meal or a board game. The fine slice top with strikingly linear grain creates a compelling experience. Matte black legs complement perfectly.

item.g:title: Capella dining chair
item.g:description: The Capella collection, with its never-before-seen design elevates your dining experience. For those who love contemporary style with minimalism, this is the perfect choice.

item.g:title: Beryl dining chair
item.g:description: This chair is all about durability. Made of titanium, it sits strong in your dining room to enhance the look of your space.

item.g:title: Andes side chair
item.g:description: Industrial design meets modern perfection with the Andes collection. Handcrafted from solid walnut, this dining chair is a great fit for any setting. The curved back lets you pamper your back even for long hours.
